function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Population-wide social distancing measures may be socially disruptive and challenging to implement.","Impact":"Increased resistance and non-compliance, leading to ineffective disease control.","Mitigation":"Clear communication, support networks, and incentives for compliance.","Technologies":"Communication platforms, monitoring systems.","People":"General population, vulnerable and marginalized communities.","Owner":"Government, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Relaxation of social distancing measures may lead to a resurgence of transmission and new waves of infection.","Impact":"Increase in infection rates, overwhelming of healthcare systems.","Mitigation":"Gradual relaxation with careful monitoring, reinforcement of public health measures, and readiness for rapid response.","Technologies":"Public health monitoring systems, rapid testing and contact tracing.","People":"Public health authorities, healthcare providers, general population.","Owner":"Government, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Inadequate implementation of home isolation and school closures may lead to continued transmission within households and educational institutions.","Impact":"Persistent transmission and outbreaks, undermining the effectiveness of other interventions.","Mitigation":"Education and support for effective home isolation, provision of resources for remote learning, and monitoring of compliance.","Technologies":"Remote learning platforms, monitoring and support systems.","People":"Students, parents, educational staff, and households.","Owner":"School administrations, educational authorities, parents."}]}
